DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is the development of noninvasive (having no direct contact) detector and electronic system that will directly measure tumor blood flow rate.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study of Tumor Blood Flow Measurement by Detection of Positron Activation Post Proton Therapy (DS01)
DOC.criteria: Solid tumors in the intracranial, thoracic, or pelvic regions. N/A
